Reviews.Title: My first Smart Phone - inexpensive and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Timothy G. Holtz
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone.  It’s replacing my eight year old Motorola V195s, (which weighs a bit more than this phone, and is somewhat more clunky) as my primary phone, with the Motorola becoming my “backup phone”.  The Motorola still works fine, but the battery charge now only holds a couple days.  I don’t subscribe to wireless internet from my provider (PureTalk USA), so I’m relying on wi-fi for internet connectivity.  I mostly wanted a smart phone for the convenience of having an FM Radio, MP3 player and phone in a single compact package.  However I’m sure I’ll find plenty of use apps, and having a basic camera in the package doesn’t hurt either.  I needed a phone with a Bluetooth connection, and I also wanted a four band “world phone”.If you’re interested in this product, you may as well download the manual NOW (Google “S5360 manual site:samsung.com”) as the manual doesn’t come with the phone.  And, if you plan to use the camera or MP3 player, you’ll need a micro SD card, so maybe order that when you order the phone.The box arrived with Spanish writing on it, so I wasn’t terribly surprised to find that when I booted the phone, the prompts weren’t in English.  Now, while there are both English and Spanish “quick start” guides provided with the product, the guide doesn’t explain the initial screen that comes up when the product is first powered on.  So, I had to go online on my computer to and translate to verify that the button labeled “cambia el idioma” was the correct button to select to change to English - because if I selected the wrong button, god knows what would happen.I’m pretty sure that the phone is unlocked.  I had no problem connecting to the AT&T; network that my provider uses.I had no trouble connecting to my home wi-fi, and I had no trouble connecting the Bluetooth to either my Garmin navigator or my Cell2Tel Bluetooth Gateway.  I also had no trouble accessing my Verizon email account.  The FM radio provides flawless reception – it’s better than the one in my MP3 player, which I considered excellent.  The touch screen is easy to use.  There doesn’t seem to be any built-in missed call or waiting voicemail reminder – it seems you need to install an app for that.  I installed a free app called Missed Call Reminder.  You can set it to give a periodic audio reminder.

Reviews.Title: Grrreatttttttt!!!!!!! liketony the tiger says,lol!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ingermar Nixon
Reviews.Content: it's a great phone for the price i paid,my friend saidhe loves his new samsung galaxy y, he says nnow no one laughs at him when he's on line,when he uses the wifi ability of the phone

Reviews.Title: Better for SMALL hands...
Reviews.Author: B. Murray
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for something that was more modern than my flip phone and what the most of everyone else is using nowadays. Here's some observations; The phone is actually called a "YOUTH" - this is where the "Y" comes from, something I missed when purchasing. The phone seems to be geared more towards younger users with its size and lack of extra features. The camera is low resolution but does take "ok" pictures. Seeing as I am 6'3" and 220 lbs, my fingers can't seem to hit just 1 letter at a time as they are soooo close together - a frustrating feature to say the least. The display is nice and it did come with several different case colors to change the phone from grey to orange, or black. Pink and white are also included. Overall I would say this would be good for a teenager but not an adult who relies heavily on their phone. I don't, so I will be keeping as I simply use it as just a phone and occasional text.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Michael Rojas Pereira
Reviews.Content: Good price, brand new phone; includes charger, USB cable and headsets which is perfect; and performance is really good for the kind of phone.

Reviews.Title: good smartphone
Reviews.Author: Gil Lessard
Reviews.Content: this phone have  fm radiohave everything  I want and morecompact phonevery good soundvery satisfied at this time

Reviews.Title: .Great product!!!!
Reviews.Author: Junella F. Burke
Reviews.Content: I found this phone to be very neat and useful for someone who is not a businessman/woman. Well worth the purchase! Will buy again and recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: revisado
Reviews.Author: Rosa de Mendoza
Reviews.Content: excelente funciona rápidamente en todas sus funciones . con todos sus accesorios incluidos. entrega en tiempo estimado. muy contenta gracias

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Rachelle G.
Reviews.Content: This was not my first smart phone, so my observations are skewed having also owned an iphone.What I didn't know when I bought this phone is that it is for youth. Which meant that a lot of the actions on the phone were not as efficient as they could be. A lot of limitations with the apps. I did the research and was looking for a simple smart phone that was not too big or too small. It was a little too small. The keyboard option was way too small for an adult hand. And, I don't have big hands. Thank goodness for the swype function, or I would never have typed anything on it. I would have given up texting completely.The camera works well, but the size is small on the upload. The FM radio feature was nice to have, I'll say that. This was certainly a plus.I found that the phone was small, sleek, and clunky to use in it's functionability. I was really unhappy with the phone overall. It was not an intuitive phone. I'd say it was a "dumb" smart phone. Not simple to use, although I think it was made to be. Probably a good phone for youth, but not a teenager. Hence the "Y" model.This phone is not compatible with the T-Mobile data network frequency. Do your homework ahead of time and know the frequency that your phone carrier uses.It did the job. But, I would not recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: JUAN CARLOS VILLARROEL
Reviews.Content: Ha sido de mucha utilidad y era lo que esperaba de eses artículo. lo recomiendo mucho. Funciona muy bien, es excelente.

Reviews.Title: item sent on time
Reviews.Author: maiguara
Reviews.Content: I have not actually seen the package, it must be sent to Venezuela. But I can say that it was sent on time to Miami. When you see the cell, I will be in a position to make any criticism, not before. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Y Unlocked.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The features of the phone were nice.  It is a much smaller phone than the regular Samsung Galaxy.  That was fine.  The internet would not connect.  The qwerty board letters are to close together.  Constantly hitting the wrong letter.  Returning the phone.  Shipping from Amazon prime was fast as always and delivered on time.

Reviews.Title: Phone was not what I expected
Reviews.Author: pablo esteban gomez
Reviews.Content: The phone was not as the one in the store, it looked like a an outdated phone. I had to returned didn't meet my exptectations.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/2100MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
2MP Camera with Geo-tagging; 3.0" TFT Capacitive Touchscreen, 256K colors, with TouchWiz UI and Touch sensitive controls; GPS with A-GPS support; Stereo FM radio with RDS; MicroSD Card Slot expendable up to 32GB; MP3 and MP4 Player and Social Networking.
Android OS, v2.3.5 (Gingerbread); CPU 830 MHz ARMv6; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Hotspot functionality; Bluetooth; Speed HSDPA, 7.2 Mbps; 3.5mm Audio Jack; Accelerometer, proximity and compass Sensors; Java MIDP 2.1 and Quickoffice document viewer.
Talk time Up to 17 h (2G)/Up to 6 h 20 min (3G)- Standby Up to 850 h (2G)/Up to 540 h (3G).
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S5360L Galaxy Y Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Metallic Gray
